featured.text: The melted bells were recast in the late 19th century.

definition.zh_def: 重新表達或改寫某事物，通常是為了使其更清晰或更具吸引力。
definition.en_def: To express or present something in a different way, often to improve clarity or appeal.
definition.example: The author decided to recast the ending of the story to make it more impactful.
